sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import Portrait from '../images/Viv.jpg' export default class About extends Component { render() { return (
{/*

Hi, I'm Vivien.

{/*

I’m a sun-seeker, roamer and coffee enthusiast. Okay, let’s get serious now.

*/} {/*

I design digital experiences and help people make their visions visible to the world.

I’m a UI and UX designer based in Stockholm. I’m currently doing a master’s degree in User Experience and Interactive Media Design at Södertörn University.

*/} */}

Good thoughtful design is the key to success for your business.

I value authenticity and sincerity in design.

In my professional career so far, I have been mostly involved in the start-up scene. I like the spirit that even though we're all just a small, seemingly insignificant part of this world, people put their whole heart into a cause because they believe they can change the world. And I’m thrilled if I can help with that. However, I'm open to different kinds of projects and happy to evolve.

Want to work with me? Let’s have a coffee.

Why I do what I do

Over the last few years, my curiosity about human psychology has grown and I've been trying to understand why people act the way they do ever since. UX allows me to combine this with my technical and creative skills, and to design digital interfaces with meaning. Innovation can bring great change in the world and I hope to contribute to that. Even if only a little bit.

Who I am

Cool that you read this far!

I'm originally from Germany. After my exchange year in Sweden, I decided to relocate to Stockholm for the time being and... well, we'll see

In my spare time you can usually find me somewhere in the sun or on a board in the mountains or on the asphalt.

) } }
